doc.field: Specifics (Republican Party National Convention, 2004). Policies & Procedures. Education. Reference.
Specifics (Republican Party National Convention, 2004). Policies & Procedures. Education. Reference.

Articles by Spadafora in WNYF (2) on origin of IMT, has CD and related materials. Materials on shadow team to Montana for the Robert Fire/training on incident management. Print matter: several handbooks on IMT (search & rescue, national interagency mobilization, escape routes, etc.) Blank log book for incident events. Videocassette from US DOJ re: "Surviving the Secondary Device". Citywide Incident Management System (CIMS) training (sign-up, Powerpoint slides, etc.). FDNY terrorism & disaster preparedness strategy, 2007. Material on FEMA's National Incident Management System. 2004 Republican National Convention Operational Plan. (Includes digital formats, video)
Specifics (Republican Party National Convention, 2004). Policies & Procedures. Education. Reference.
